definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feel, enjoy (with the senses) (Now comp. Ar. h.as=a feel, perceive by senses; NH [[חוּשׁ]] feel pain; Aram. h.o4, [[חוּשׁ]], feel pain; Eth. h.w4s:: perception)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[מִּי יאׁכַל וּמִי יׇחוּשׁ]] Ec 2:25 who can eat and who can feel (i.e. enjoy pleasure)?
